project_title.value: Global Motors Group Global RFQ for Clutch Assembly on 14L 'K-Series' Engine 2028 - 2033

project_description.value: Global RFQ for the supply of a clutch assembly, including the Clutch Assembly C-500 (AC-559-3400-01), Clutch Plate D-310 Gen 3 (AC-881-4900-11), and Release Bearing (AC-151-3430-89), for the 14L 'K-Series' Engine program from 2028 to 2033.

contracting_authority.value: Global Motors Group and its subsidiaries, including Nordic Haulers Oy and OmniTruck Corporation.

location_of_works_services.value: Production is planned at the Apex Components Inc. plant in Waterford, Michigan, USA. The supplier reserves the right to relocate production based on future cost developments.

contact_person_details.value: Daniel Miller, Senior Account Manager, email: daniel.miller@apex-comp.com, phone: +1 248 555 0165. David Fischer, Senior Account Manager, email: david.fischer@apexcomp.com, phone: +71 754 779 60149.

contract_start_date.value: The program starts in 2028. Start of Production (SOP) is planned for 2 months after PPAP approval.

scope_of_work.value: Supply of Clutch Assembly for the 14L 'K-Series' Engine program. Key components include Clutch Assembly C-500 (AC-559-3400-01), Clutch Plate D-310 Gen 3 (AC-881-4900-11), and Release Bearing (AC-151-3430-89).

methodology_requirements.value: The supplier performs the Product Emergence Process based on Automotive Association Maturity Level Assurance ('QPN Integral').

technical_specifications.value: Key specifications include torque capacity of 2050 Nm, clutch cover burst speed of 5200 rpm, clutch disc burst speed of 6200 rpm (supplier achieves 6150 RPM), and wear capacity of min. 3.5 mm. The assembly must conform to Tier 5 emission standards and Nordic Haulers Specification NH-4518990 rev. A.

required_outputs_deliverables.value: Serial production parts, B-Samples (lead time approx. 10 weeks), C-Samples, and PPAP documentation.

equipment_or_materials.value: Key materials include HRC, CRC, and ALUM. The clutch plate uses advanced friction material F850X and the release bearing uses Extended-Life Lubricant (ELL).

site_access_requirements.value: OmniTruck can view documents containing Apex Components-specific know-how at the supplier's facility in special cases.

data_management_standards.value: Use of eQuality Suite (eQS) for billing and change requests, IMDS for material composition reporting, and CAD systems like PTC Creo with data transfer capabilities.

mandatory_supplier_information.value: DUNS: 453219876, Corporate Registry No: 802154321. Supplier numbers for AutoCorp (730005) and Nordic Haulers (NH-SUPPLIER-753009) are on record.

certifications_and_accreditations.value: IATF 16949:2016, DIN EN ISO 9001:2015 (both valid until 2028-02-28), and Automotive Quality Standard AQS-2016. The manufacturing process was positively audited by AutoCorp Group according to VDA 6.3 (score >= 85%).

references_and_experience.value: Market and technology leader in commercial vehicle clutch systems. Existing supplier to OmniTruck, Nordic Haulers, and AutoCorp Group. Annual supply volume to Nordic Haulers is approx. 75,000 units.

subcontractor_requirements.value: The supplier must ensure its own suppliers are certified to AQS-2016. A portion of the product will be sourced from sub-suppliers who are not yet nominated.

technical_criteria.value: Based on a signed compliance matrix (doc id 9876543) against technical product specifications. Feasibility is confirmed subject to comments.

commercial_criteria.value: Pricing is evaluated based on two scenarios: Scenario A for 50% Pan-Continental volume (NHEU + OmniTruck) and Scenario B for 50% Pan-Continental plus 100% Americas volume.

pricing_format.value: Net prices per unit in USD, excluding taxes and service part packaging. Two pricing scenarios are offered based on volume commitments. One-time payment for development costs (210,000 USD) and separate pricing for prototypes.

price_inclusions.value: Prices are based on FCA (IncotermsÂ® 2020) at the Waterford, Michigan plant. Price adjustment clauses exist for raw materials (HRC, CRC, ALUM) and energy (Electricity, Natural Gas).

payment_terms.value: Payment due 45 days after delivery and invoice date. Development costs are 100% payable upon receipt of nomination letter. Supplier wishes to participate in a Supply Chain Finance program.

invoicing_requirements.value: The eBilling system, a module of the eQ-Suite, is to be used. Field claims are billed at least twice per calendar year.

terms_and_conditions.value: The quotation is governed by the General Supply Agreement (GSA-15) and its memorandum of understanding, as well as the GSA contracts 55890 & 44123. The MoU for QRS-20 has precedence over standard OmniTruck Purchasing Conditions.

acceptance_of_terms.value: The supplier adheres to Nordic Haulers Specification NH-4518990 rev. A, confirmed via a signed compliance matrix.

confidentiality_requirements.value: Documents containing Apex Components-specific know-how are excluded from the transfer of sampling documents and can only be viewed on-site by OmniTruck in special cases.

intellectual_property_rights.value: Supplier holds patents which are publicly registered and available for review.

termination_clauses.value: If the project is terminated by Nordic Haulers, Apex is to be reimbursed for total development, application, and project costs incurred to date.

dispute_resolution.value: Arbitration in Stuttgart, Concordia, under the rules of the Concordia Institution of Arbitration. Proceedings can be in German or English with 3 arbitrators.

self_declaration_requirements.value: A Supplier Self Assessment (SSA) was submitted on 2025-11-15.

evidence_submission_timing.value: Material data sheets (MDS) via IMDS must be submitted at least 1 week before signing the Part Submission Warrant (PSW) for PPAP.

sustainability_commitments.value: Supplier aims for carbon neutrality by 2045, joined the Global Sustainability Pact in 2013, and adopted the Global Development Goals (GDGs) in 2016.

contract_management_arrangements.value: Management via eQ-Suite and its modules (ePPAP, eQuality, e-Billing, eSCR). Supplier must validate contact persons in eQS at least twice per year.

key_project_milestones.value: Pre-production: 18 months after nomination. PPAP: 19 months after nomination. SOP (Start of Production): 2 months after PPAP approval.

quality_assurance_measures.value: 100% functional checks for safety/legal/function relevant units. Process capability targets of Cpk >= 1.33 and Cmk >= 1.67. Use of methods like FMEA and 8D. A 'No Trouble Found (NTF)' process is established for unresolved complaints.
